name: T. & T.
description:
Welcome to ERCO.

This harsh world is divided in two.

You and your friend have been stranded in this world and have to go on a trip to find a better place. One part is always covered in darkness, where nothing can be seen. But be glad, as during the day, monsters roam the fields.

Use the night to travel from the start to the path to the next land. Keep an eye on the clock and plan your nightly trips wisely.

How to play

You are in control of your player (yellow) whilst the field is covered in darkness. Move around but try to avoid traps and monsters.

Controls

Movement: KeyPad (intended for touch) or W/A/S/D / arrow keys.

The position of the keypad can be swapped to either the left or right side (or hidden completely).
